entities.name: dundley
entities.description: Dudley is described as having a good holiday and whimpering when his backside is touched by Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as seeing his hands tighten over Dudley's massive backside and noticing the Dursleys drawing back against the wall.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as coming into the room with George carrying Harry's school trunk.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as coming into the room with Fred carrying Harry's school trunk.

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is described as pushing up his sleeves and taking out his wand to cast a spell.

entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: The Dursleys are mentioned as drawing back against the wall when Mr. Weasley casts a spell.

entities.name: burrow
entities.description: The Burrow is mentioned as being the location where the events take place.

relationships.description: Mr. Weasley casts a spell on the Dursleys, causing them to draw back against the wall.
The Burrow is Mr. Weasley's location.
